metadata.title: MACRS Depreciation Calculator | Fixed Asset Depreciation Software
metadata.description: MACRS Depreciation Calculator automates MACRS, ADS, bonus, and Section 179 schedules for accountants and finance teams.
metadata.keywords: MACRS depreciation calculator, IRS Form 4562, fixed asset software, Section 179, bonus depreciation

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: We'd love to hear what went well or how we can improve the product experience.

component_one.title: Build depreciation schedules without spreadsheets
component_one.description: Automate MACRS, ADS, bonus and Section 179 schedules from one workspace.
component_one.subdescription: Import asset listings, apply IRS conventions, and export audit-ready Form 4562 support in minutes.

control_panel.title: Depreciation run setup
control_panel.description: Import asset data, choose the correct convention, and generate schedules instantly.
control_panel.aspect_ratio_description: Select the IRS convention that applies to this asset group.
control_panel.output_count_description: Choose how many years to project depreciation.
control_panel.prompt_description: Explain adjustments or assumptions for this run.
control_panel.prompt_placeholder: Example: Asset transferred mid-quarter and needs override in year 3.
control_panel.file_types: We accept .csv and .xlsx files up to 10MB.

calculator.title: MACRS Depreciation Calculator
calculator.description: Enter any two values - depreciable basis, rate, or expense - and we will calculate the third.
calculator.hero_description: Calculate MACRS, ADS, bonus, and Section 179 depreciation with audit-ready precision.

cpm.title: Depreciation Rate Calculator
cpm.label: Depreciation rate (%)
cpm.description: Determine the MACRS depreciation rate using basis and annual expense.
cpm.calculation_description: To calculate the depreciation rate, enter:

cpa.title: Bonus Depreciation Calculator
cpa.label: Bonus depreciation amount
cpa.description: Calculate bonus depreciation for eligible property after Section 179 deductions.

cpc.title: Section 179 Calculator
cpc.label: Section 179 deduction
cpc.description: Evaluate Section 179 elections by solving for deduction amount, qualifying spend, or deduction percentage.
cpc.card_description: Compute deduction amount, qualifying spend, or deduction percentage for Section 179 elections.
cpc.cpc_description: To calculate the deduction amount, enter:
cpc.total_cost_description: To calculate the required qualifying spend, enter:
cpc.clicks_description: To calculate remaining deduction capacity, enter:
cpc.error_min_fields: Please fill in at least two fields

ctr.title: Mid-Quarter Test Calculator
ctr.label: Mid-quarter percentage
ctr.description: Assess mid-quarter convention impact on your depreciation schedule.
ctr.calculation_description: To calculate the mid-quarter percentage, enter:
ctr.step2: Basis placed in service during Q4
ctr.card_description: Evaluate mid-quarter percentage, total basis, or Q4 basis as needed.
ctr.clicks_description: Total basis placed in service for the year
ctr.impressions_description: Basis placed in service during the last quarter
ctr.ctr_formula: Formula: Mid-quarter % = Q4 basis / Total basis x 100%
ctr.conversions_description: Basis that qualifies for ADS treatment
ctr.cvr_card_description: Compute ADS depreciation rate, annual expense, or remaining basis.
ctr.error_min_fields: Please fill in at least two fields

roi.description: Frame the cash impact of depreciation by comparing expense and tax rate.

cpm_data_selector.title: Asset Class Explorer
cpm_data_selector.description: Review IRS property classes, recovery periods, and conventions.

cpm_features.title: Powerful depreciation workflows
cpm_features.description: Everything you need to import assets, compute MACRS schedules, and report results.

calculate.title: Accurate calculations
calculate.description: Apply MACRS, ADS, bonus, and Section 179 rules automatically with IRS factors.

analyze.title: Variance analysis
analyze.description: Compare book versus tax depreciation, run projections, and flag variances early.

optimize.title: Close management
optimize.description: Coordinate mid-quarter tests, adjustments, and approvals across every entity.

report.title: Audit-ready reporting
report.description: Export Form 4562 support, journal entries, and detailed schedules for each asset.

cpm.title: MACRS overview
cpm.subtitle: Stay aligned with the latest IRS tables
cpm.description: Review recovery periods, conventions, and depreciation rates for every property class included in the 2025 IRS update.

cpc.title: Section 179 planning
cpc.subtitle: Immediate expensing for qualifying property
cpc.description: Evaluate Section 179 limits, phase-outs, and deduction elections before year end.

cpa.title: Bonus depreciation scenarios
cpa.subtitle: Model 80% bonus and future phase-downs
cpa.description: Compare bonus depreciation impact across entities and track remaining basis automatically.

ctr.title: ADS schedules
ctr.subtitle: Compute alternative depreciation requirements
ctr.description: Switch to ADS for AMT or international compliance while keeping book and tax views aligned.

roi.title: Reporting and exports
roi.subtitle: Deliver audit-ready documentation
roi.description: Generate Form 4562 support, journal entries, roll-forward schedules, and variance explanations with one click.

youtube.title: Daily close checklist
youtube.subtitle: Stay on top of depreciation tasks
youtube.description: Track run status, reviewer assignments, and outstanding adjustments across every entity.
